EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.DC - PAIR - Post Event - No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Advanced Analytics Journey with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Sorry we missed you at the Pivotal Analytics and Innovation Roadshow (PAIR). We presented several examples of organizations applying data science and analytics to deliver better outcomes for their stakeholders.
We’d be happy to speak with you about how to be successful with your own analytics initiatives. In the meantime here are some resources to start you on your journey:
-
Presentation: The Art of the Possible with Analytics:AI, Machine Learning, Graph and More <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1mxna9IuutXZkxXcnhKRFk0TzA/view]]>
-
Webinar Replay: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation, with Neil Raden, Principal Analyst, Hired Brains Research <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation]]>
-
White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]>
Also, take advantage of additional online resources for Data Science <[[https://content.pivotal.io/data-science]]> and Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]>.
Interested in accelerating your journey to the cloud? Join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io]]>, the premier conference for those who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software. Registration is now open. Use this code before June 24th and save $500 off a full S1P pass: S1P_EVENT_PAIR100
Now is the time to take the reins of your digital transformation. Let’s build something meaningful!
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
